content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite comfortable and convenient. How much were you thinking of paying for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm looking for a fair price for this apartment. It seems to be in a great location and is quite new. Could you tell me what the lowest rent you would consider would be?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but I can't provide you with a specific number. As you mentioned, the location and condition of the apartment are quite favorable, so I'm looking to get a market-value price. However, I'm open to reasonable offers. What did you have in mind?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you're looking for market value, and I appreciate the quality of the apartment. I was hoping to negotiate a bit lower than the average price, considering that the apartment is unfurnished. Would you be willing to go as low as 800 Euro per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 800 Euro per month is quite low for the location and standard of this apartment. I'm looking for a tenant who appreciates the value of this property and is willing to pay a fair price. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I apologize if my initial offer was too low. I'm new to the area and still getting a feel for the market. Would you consider 850 Euro per month as a more fair price? This would include all utilities, correct?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: No problem, Haoyu. It's completely normal to have different perceptions of value. While 850 Euro per month is closer to what I'm looking for, it still falls short of my expectations for this particular apartment. I can't include all utilities in that price, but I can offer a discount on the water and electricity if you sign a one-year lease. Would you be willing to reconsider your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you're offering a discount on utilities with a one-year lease. That's quite generous. I'm willing to increase my offer to 900 Euro per month, including the utilities discount, for a one-year lease. Is this acceptable to you, Mister Schmidt?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 900 Euro per month with the utilities discount for a one-year lease is an offer I can consider. However, I would like to clarify that the discount applies only to the water and electricity, and not to other services like internet or cable TV. Would you be okay with this condition?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, Mister Schmidt, I'm okay with that condition. A one-year lease with the utilities discount is a fair offer. I agree to the price of 900 Euro per month with the specified utilities discount for a one-year lease. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
